display_long_description:
Astro Rhythm combines classic arcade space shooting with modern mixed reality gameplay. Step into your room and transform it into a living rhythm arena where music drives every move.

Each track becomes a battle zone as obstacles and targets sync perfectly to the beat. Blast, dodge, and groove your way through more than 50 energetic songs across multiple difficulty modes designed to test your reflexes and timing.

Earn medals and reach Gold Rank to unlock new ships, each with unique visual flair and performance style. With every song mastered, you rise from rookie pilot to rhythm ace.

Astro Rhythm captures the heart of old-school arcade shooters while pushing VR and MR immersion to the limit. Experience music as motion, challenge yourself to perfect runs, and compete for the highest scores.

Can you keep your aim, timing, and rhythm in sync long enough to claim every ship and conquer the stars?
